How did the founders of VerusCoin make their money, considering the ICO they held?

There was no ICO (Initial Coin Offering) for VerusCoin. The project is community-driven, and the blockchain was launched with a fair opportunity for everyone to start mining and staking the coin from the very beginning. There are no founder or developer fees associated with the project.

Fair Launch: No ICO, Pre-Mine or Developer and Founder Fees
An announcement was made 15 minutes prior to the launch of the blockchain [see BitcoinTalk announcement]. From the very first beginnings of the VerusCoin blockchain anyone had a fair opportunity to start mining and then staking the coin. Verus is a community driven project in the true spirit of Bitcoin — no ICO, no pre-mine, no founder or developers fees.
The Verus Coin Foundation pushes development further to accomplish its vision for the future [see Verus Vision Paper]. Anyone who wants to contribute to the project, in any capacity, is welcome. Join our ever growing community on Discord to find out more about the Verus Project.VerusHash 2.2: Lowering Mining Barriers for Everyone
VerusHash 2.2 is the mining algorithm for VerusCoin. The algorithm was developed to explicitly equalize FPGAs and modern CPUs, and to create a naturally decentralized miner ecosystem.
No specialized mining equipment is necessary to mine VerusCoin, and it can even be solo-mined directly from the Verus Desktop wallet with just a few clicks, without any additional software requirements. Beginners can find an even level playing field to start earning VRSC.
Start mining now, get your VRSC mining software here, or start solo mining from within Verus Desktop.
What kind of specialized mining equipment do I need to purchase to start mining VerusCoin?

You don't need any specialized mining equipment to mine VerusCoin. The VerusHash 2.2 mining algorithm is designed to equalize FPGAs and modern CPUs, creating a naturally decentralized miner ecosystem. You can even solo-mine VerusCoin directly from the Verus Desktop wallet with just a few clicks, without any additional software requirements.

How can I contribute to the development of VerusCoin, considering it's a closed project only open to the founding team?

VerusCoin is not a closed project. It's a community-driven project, and anyone who wants to contribute to it, in any capacity, is welcome. You can join the growing community on Discord to find out more about the Verus Project and how you can get involved.
